overviewText.text: Step into a world of elegance and serenity at Address Creek Harbour, where luxurious charm meets breathtaking views of Dubai's iconic skyline.

Unwind by the stunning infinity pool, enjoy a culinary journey at the venue’s world-class restaurants, or simply take in a sunset drink at the famous view point. Enjoy a slow daycay experience in Dubai Creek Harbour with complimentary pool access for Privilee Members, plus 20% off dining and drinks.

content.text: Opening hours
Monday to Sunday: 10 am - 8 pm
1-hour complimentary access, per day
Plan your visit to Qix Kids Club via Address Creek Harbour's main venue page
Upon arrival, please check-in at the pool counter on the 3rd floor
Your kids can enjoy 1-hour of complimentary access; if they'd like to stay longer, there is a charge of AED 65 per additional hour
Kids must be aged 4 - 16
Qix Kids Club is supervised and strictly drop-off only
Complimentary valet parking is available

overviewText.text: Get exclusive complimentary access to this adults-only location on The Palm! Nestled within the iconic W Dubai – The Palm Jumeirah, BCH:CLB offers an unparalleled experience blending art, entertainment, and global music.
Discover the stunning new COVEBEACH location at La Vie, JBR.
Enjoy adults-only access to the world-renowned beach club. Lounge by the Moët pool with picture-perfect sea views and experience unique dining concepts.

overviewText.text: Just the ticket for a younger crowd, this property has a vast beach and pool, complete with swim-up bar and submerged loungers. With views of Bluewaters and Ain Dubai, the world’s largest observation wheel, there’s plenty to see. If you’re looking for a party you’ll find it here, every Friday.

overviewText.text: Daycay, dine and work out at this unique landmark destination in Abu Dhabi, you can do it all at Erth Abu Dhabi and Etizan Fitness!

From relaxing daycays in a dreamy setting at Al Waryah Pool to training like a pro at Etizan Fitness - there are endless ways to get active or take time out. The world-class facilities feature a mixed and ladies-only premium gym, an Olympic-sized pool, squash court, plus sauna and steam rooms!

overviewText.text: Escape to Fairmont Ajman for the ultimate beach escape! Enjoy relaxed days by the infinity pool or on the private sandy beach, surrounded by palm trees and beautiful sea views.  Whether you're chilling in a private cabana, sipping cocktails at the swim-up bar, or soaking up the sun, there's plenty to enjoy. Families, get ready for fun with kids' club activities like treasure hunts and sandcastle building, plus the Aqua Bounce floating water park.

content.text: Complimentary access
Book your visit to Fairmont Ajman's Kid's Club via the 'Plan a visit' button on Fairmont Ajman's Privilee Page

Kids must be aged 2 - 12

overviewText.text: This property is the definition of gym goals. There’s no compromising on your workout when you have access to a full range of high-tech cardio and strength equipment, plus an outdoor running track and space for agility and freestyle training. Cool down with a dip in the infinity pool, which overlooks the breathtaking Arabian Gulf.

overviewText.text: This 128-acre five-star resort is a ‘magical Privilee daycation wonderland’ that you won't ever want to leave! With access to a stunning golden sand beach, multiple pools, gym, spa and activity centre, there will be something for the whole family to enjoy. From crazy golf, a bird sanctuary, squash courts, badminton, table tennis plus multiple restaurants and bars, you’re sure to find something to suit you.

overviewText.text: Experience a five-star resort, Le Méridien Abu Dhabi! Whether you’re looking for a relaxing pool day, family fun, or a new workout spot, the renowned location in Al Zahiyah has so much to offer.
Experience a taste of Italy by the sea at Mare by Bussola! Enjoy adults-only daycations at this chic beach club inspired by the Italian Riviera.

Experience the world-famous Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Dubai with Privilee! Explore what’s waiting for you at this jaw-dropping destination and get ready to enjoy complimentary adults-only pool and beach access.

items.name: PLAYA Dubai
items.location: The Club, Palm West Beach, The Palm Jumeirah

overviewText.text: Discover a dreamy beach club located in the heart of Palm West Beach. Enjoy complimentary adults-only pool and beach access, plus 20% off the delicious Peruvian-inspired menu. This is the perfect setting to unwind at the pool or on the beach while enjoying the Insta-worthy setting. When the sun sets the vibes heat up with live DJs and a buzzing atmosphere to complete the ultimate daycay experience on the Palm.

items.name: THE BEACH at Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Dubai

overviewText.text: Discover THE BEACH at Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Dubai, offering stunning sea views, golden sands, and the perfect place to relax.

Members can bring up to three kids per family, making it ideal for a family daycation. Enjoy 20% off dining, whether it’s refreshing drinks at THE BEACH or a taste of Côte d’Azur-inspired cuisine at Café Nikki.

overviewText.text: Get complimentary access to VOGO Abu Dhabi Golf Resort & Spa, exclusively with Privilee! From peaceful pool days to wellness activities in the lap pool, gym, and recovery facilities, the resort appeals to all interests.

overviewText.text: With an exclusive location between a Grand Prix racetrack and the marina, W Abu Dhabi – Yas Island is an exhilarating daycation getaway. With access to the adults-only WET Deck pool, full-fledged fitness centre, spa, and dining spots like no other, you’ll be in for a real treat,

overviewText.text: Daycay at Abu Dhabi’s best-kept secret, the only beach club on Yas Island! With white sands, crystal clear waters and natural mangrove surroundings, this picture-perfect beach club is the ultimate destination to soak up the sunshine, spend time with loved ones and forget where you are.

overviewText.text: This cooler than cool retreat is one of a kind. The modern outdoor terrace is a great place to socialise and features a pool, bar and giant screen for movie nights. The fitness facilities are outstanding, with 56 exercise stations and an outdoor sprint track. Post-workout, refuel with a healthy breakfast at Social Company, where furry friends are more than welcome.
